mapper.select: SELECT a.PID, a.CATECODE, a.PNAME, a.CATENAME, a.LAT, a.LNG, b.STARTDATE, b.ENDDATE, b.PADDR1, b.PADDR2, b.PADDR3, b.PPRICE, b.PINTRO, b.PCONTENTS FROM jp_map a INNER JOIN jp_pop b ON a.PID = b.PID WHERE a.PID = #{pid}

select count(*) from JP_POP where
pId >0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.PID, P.PNAME, P.STARTDATE, P.ENDDATE, P.PADDR1, P.PADDR2, P.PPRICE, COUNT(C.PID) AS rating, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(C.PID) DESC) AS row_num FROM JP_POP P LEFT JOIN JP_CART C ON P.PID = C.PID GROUP BY P.PID, P.PNAME, P.STARTDATE, P.ENDDATE, P.PADDR1, P.PADDR2, P.PPRICE ) sub WHERE sub.row_num <= 20
select startDate from JP_POP where pName like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jp_Review (mId, pId, contents, score, rDate) VALUES (#{mId}, #{pId}, #{contents}, #{score}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO jp_Rimage (uploadPath, uuid, fileName, pId, mId) VALUES (#{uploadPath}, #{uuid}, #{fileName}, #{pId}, #{mId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM jp_Rimage WHERE mId = #{mId} AND pId = #{pId}
SELECT r.*, i.uploadPath, i.uuid, i.fileName, p.pName FROM jp_Review r LEFT JOIN jp_Rimage i ON r.pId = i.pId AND r.mId = i.mId LEFT JOIN jp_pop p ON r.pId = p.pId WHERE r.mId =#{mId}
mapper.delete: delete from jp_review where pId = #{pId} and mId=#{mId}
delete from jp_rimage where pId = #{pId} and mId=#{mId}
